name: THINK29
body:
## The Enlightenment Project

![Salons](http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/cb/Salon_de_Madame_Geoffrin.jpg/800px-Salon_de_Madame_Geoffrin.jpg)

List of the intellectual figures whose networks the students are mapping:
* Galileo
* Descartes
* Montesquieu
* Voltaire
* Boyle
* Jefferson
* Madison
